Description_lang: Greedy thoughts fill your head. Whenever you inflict damage or heal an ally, there is a chance for an orb of golden energy to appear around them. Picking up this energy applies $@spellname340333. This effect only happens in combat.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage an enemy or healing an ally has a change to create an golden orb.Picking up the golden orb applies $@spellname340333.This effect only happens in combat.
